docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a security guard at a northern Virginia mall has died after being stabbed by a suspected shoplifter who fled the scene.

headline.print_headline: Police: Security Guard Fatally Stabbed at Virginia Mall
headline.main: Police: Security Guard Fatally Stabbed at Virginia Mall

docs.snippet: Police say a security guard at a northern Virginia mall has died after being stabbed by a suspected shoplifter who fled the scene....

docs.lead_paragraph: Longtime captain Christie Rampone is walking away from the U.S. national women's soccer team hoping to be remembered as a team player whose fondest memories will be of the players who joined her journey, which lasted almost two decades.

headline.print_headline: Longtime Captain Christie Rampone Honored Before US Game
headline.main: Longtime Captain Christie Rampone Honored Before US Game

docs.snippet: Longtime captain Christie Rampone is walking away from the U.S. national women's soccer team hoping to be remembered as a team player whose fondest memories will be of the players who joined her journey, which lasted almost two decades....

docs.lead_paragraph: China set a budget deficit target of 3 percent of gross domestic product for 2017, in line with last year's target, and pledged to clamp down on local government debt risk, the finance ministry said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: China Sets 3 Percent Deficit Target, to Clamp Down on Local Debt Risk
headline.main: China Sets 3 Percent Deficit Target, to Clamp Down on Local Debt Risk

docs.snippet: China set a budget deficit target of 3 percent of gross domestic product for 2017, in line with last year's target, and pledged to clamp down on local government debt risk, the finance ministry said on Sunday....

docs.lead_paragraph: Britain plans to spend an extra half a billion pounds a year to improve skills training, the government said on Sunday, seeking to address the country’s nagging productivity problems as it prepares to leave the European Union.

headline.print_headline: UK Ramps Up Skills Training to Tackle Productivity Problem
headline.main: UK Ramps Up Skills Training to Tackle Productivity Problem

docs.snippet: Britain plans to spend an extra half a billion pounds a year to improve skills training, the government said on Sunday, seeking to address the country’s nagging productivity problems as it prepares to leave the European Union....

docs.lead_paragraph: South Carolina coach Dawn Staley had no worries about how her team would perform without all-Southeastern Conference forward Alaina Coates in the lineup, winning three of the past four games with the senior mostly on the sidelines.

headline.print_headline: Wilson Leads No. 5 South Carolina Over Kentucky 89-77
headline.main: Wilson Leads No. 5 South Carolina Over Kentucky 89-77

docs.lead_paragraph: Christopher Bell held off Matt Crafton on a restart with two laps to go and completed a dominating win Saturday in the NASCAR Camping World Truck Series race at Atlanta Motor Speedway.

docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities in South Carolina say deputies answering a 911 call have shot and killed a man who pointed a gun at them.

docs.lead_paragraph: China has cut its growth target this year as the world's second-largest economy pushes through painful reforms to address a rapid build-up in debt, and constructs a "firewall" against financial risks.

headline.print_headline: China Cuts Growth Target as It Pushes Through Reforms, Builds 'Firewall' Against Risks
headline.main: China Cuts Growth Target as It Pushes Through Reforms, Builds 'Firewall' Against Risks

docs.snippet: China has cut its growth target this year as the world's second-largest economy pushes through painful reforms to address a rapid build-up in debt, and constructs a "firewall" against financial risks....
